Package professional.team17.com.professional.Adapters

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ItemClickSupport.OnItemClickListener  
    ItemClickSupport.OnItemLongClickListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AssignedListProviderView
    ViewHolder for the recyler view for providertasks.
    BiddedListProviderView
    ViewHolder for the recyler view for providertasks.
    BidListAdapter
    To inflate the row selection for bids
    GridViewAdapter  
    ItemClickSupport
    This method is sourced from https://www.littlerobots.nl/blog/Handle-Android-RecyclerView-Clicks/ by Hugo Visser (it is free to use).
    NotificationListAdapter
    An adapter to show the list of notifications.
    PlaceAutoCompleteAdapter
    Adapter that handles Autocomplete requests from the Places Geo Data API.
    ProviderListViewAdapter
    This is the adapter to help with provider recycler lists This was implemented as the listview was quite slow.
    RequesterCustomArrayAdapter
    An array adapter for RequesterViewListActivity.
    RequesterListProviderView
    ViewHolder for the recyler view for providertasks.
    RequesterViewHolder
    Holds the view objects for the ProviderCustomArrayAdapter.
    ReviewsAdaptor
    ReviewsAdaptor is used when looking at the profiles of both current user and other users.
